name: VILIRON TABLET
kandungan: Vit B1 mononitrate 3 mg, vit B2 2 mg, vit B6 HCl 1 mg, vit B12 2 mcg, vit C 25 mg, folic acid 200 mcg, Ca pantothenate 3 mg, niacinamide 20 mg, dessicated liver extr 15 mg, Fe 15 mg, copper 300 mcg, dioctyl Na sulfosuccinate 20 mg
dosis: Pencegahan : 1 tablet sehari. Terapeutik : 2-3 tablet sehari.
